channel.title: Cape and shield going into wrong spot?
channel.description: ok I added new items and I add items all the time to my server but when I go to equip them they go into the weapon spot instead of the cape or shield spot? any quick fixes?

item.title: Cape and shield going into wrong spot?
item.dc:creator: @BigBadSoft BigBadSoft
item.description:
@BigBadSoft wrote:

So I would go to weapons, then search for the item id, then put it in the proper spot?

Read full topic
